name: YouTube Video Picker App
description: YouTube video and playlist picker for Agility CMS with API integration.

configValues.name: apiKey
configValues.label: YouTube API Key
configValues.description: Your YouTube Data API v3 key from Google Cloud Console

configValues.name: channelId
configValues.label: YouTube Channel ID
configValues.description: Default channel ID to load videos from - go to https://www.youtube.com/account_advanced when logged in to your account to copy and paste

configValues.name: dataFormat
configValues.label: Data Format
configValues.description: Choose how video data is stored in fields

configValues.name: includeTags
configValues.label: Include Video Tags
configValues.description: Include video tags in simplified format (when available)

configValues.name: includeDescription
configValues.label: Include Full Description
configValues.description: Include full video description (can be lengthy)

fields.name: youtube-video-picker
fields.label: YouTube Video Picker
fields.description: Select a single YouTube video with preview and metadata.

fields.name: youtube-multi-video-picker
fields.label: YouTube Multiple Video Picker
fields.description: Select multiple YouTube videos with management interface.

fields.name: youtube-playlist-picker
fields.label: YouTube Playlist Picker
fields.description: Select YouTube playlists with preview and metadata.

modals.name: youtube-video-selector
modals.label: YouTube Video Selector
modals.description: Modal for browsing and selecting YouTube videos.

modals.name: youtube-multi-video-selector

modals.name: youtube-playlist-selector
